channel.title: 669 / 704 Webclient help?
channel.description:
i have correctly jar'd and signed the client. but when i try to run it i get "could not find main class: Loader. Programe will exit. and the Loader.java is where i said it was but it cant find it help?
skype: CalvinOwnedYou

item.title: 669 / 704 Webclient help?
item.dc:creator: @562-Pro 562-Pro
item.description:
@562-Pro wrote:

yea sorry thats what im doing.
i am jaring the .class files that are in the “bin” folder
and then making the main class Loader. and get
error cannot find main class: Loader

Read full topic

item.title: 669 / 704 Webclient help?
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

That’s probably because loader.java is in the right spot,
but loader.class isn’t.

And as the page tries to load the .class files,
it can’t load.

[i]NOTE: the .class files are not in src but in bin

Read full topic
